eventDecorators.name: DevaluationPeriodChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: InitialCollateralRatioChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationDiscountChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationRatioChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets ability to use token as the main collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

parameterDecorators.name: stabilityFeeValue
parameterDecorators.description: The percentage of the year stability fee (3 decimals).

functionDecorators.name: setDevaluationPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the devaluation period of collateral after liquidation.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: setInitialCollateralRatio
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the initial collateral ratio.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: setLiquidationDiscount
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the liquidation discount.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: setLiquidationRatio
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the liquidation ratio.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.
